Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting Detailsmy 11 yr old daughter and her friend also 11 were helping me cover the orange trees down our 600 foot long driveway as we are rural with 11 acres because of a hard freeze tonite. as we were looking to the north sky I saw a very bright oval light no flashing lights and it was moving faster than a jet but not in the flight paterns of commercial flights I said hey kids this isn't a plane lets watch it! for maybe 20 seconds it sped across the sky maybe 15 - 20% of the horizon. It slowed down and then shot straight up becoming a pinpoint of light and then just disappeared. This was my daughters 2nd sighting and strangly enough it was exactly 3 years to the day! We always watch meteor showers and tonite was the last night of the Leonids. We know this wasn't a meteor because meteors dont change their minds and go back up. We are avid skywatchers. I have had 19 sightings since 1965.
